definition: even now/until now/right up to the present
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: Until now, the rats under study have met two of the three elements of addiction.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，研究中的大鼠符合成癮三要素當中的二項。

sentences.english: But until now most of the work was on classifying the tracks.
sentences.chinese: 但直到現在，大多數工作仍然還是給足跡分類。

sentences.english: I am alone on my life's Journey up to now.
sentences.chinese: 我獨自的一個人在人生的旅途中行走直到現在。

sentences.english: The over-supplying problem of building estates still exists now.
sentences.chinese: 樓盤的供應過剩的問題直到現在任然存在。

sentences.english: I tore my muscle quite bad and it took me up to now to recover and get fit.
sentences.chinese: 我把肌肉拉傷得很厲害，這讓我直到現在才康復。
直到現在我仍然難以相信。

sentences.english: I have never visited Taitung up to the present.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，我都還沒有去臺東玩過。

sentences.english: "To this day I have no sensation in my lower lip and chin, " says the architect from Germantown, Md.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，我對自己的下顎都一點感覺也沒有。

sentences.english: UnitllUntil now, the drug melarsoprol was used to treat patients in the advanced stages of sleeping sickness.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，治療晚期昏睡病患者時都用硫腫蜜胺藥物。

sentences.english: Sadly, there are still people in the world today who are living as slaves.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是直到現在，世界上還有人過着奴隸生活。

sentences.english: Up until now I think that Terrace had quite a privileged rendering of the story.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，我也認爲特勒斯對這個故事有優先解釋權。

sentences.english: He was wiped out yesterday and doesn't wake up till now.
sentences.chinese: 他昨晚喝醉了，直到現在還沒醒。

sentences.english: And so far I still live the life of a vagrant.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在還是過着流浪的生活。

sentences.english: But most of them also called the country Zhongguo (central kingdom) until now.
sentences.chinese: 但是人們仍舊將這個國家稱之爲中國，直到現在。

sentences.english: Jason now has nine years sober.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在他九年都都沒醉過。

sentences.english: Up to that moment she had never thought of her face.
sentences.chinese: 她直到現在，還從來沒有想到過自己臉蛋兒的模樣。
